metadata.Title: CVE-2014-3242 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
SOAPpy 0.12.5 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a SOAP request containing an external entity declaration in conjunction with an entity reference, related to an XML External Entity (XXE) issue.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-3242` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-soappy - 0.12.22-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: python-soappy package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.12.22-1').
